solution_line_template: The pig grew to half the size of the average pig, so it will produce {average_bacon_pounds} / {size_divisor} = <<{average_bacon_pounds}/{size_divisor}={runt_bacon_pounds}>>{runt_bacon_pounds} pounds of bacon.
The rancher will make {runt_bacon_pounds} * {price_per_pound} = $<<{runt_bacon_pounds}*{price_per_pound}={total_earnings}>>{total_earnings} from the pig's bacon.
